Change for Change.desc:
This month's Change for Change we be held at Tony's SpeakEasy. Funds will be donated to the Barberton Beautification Fund.
March 28, 5:00-7:00

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed 4/.desc: City offices will be closed Friday, April 18 in observance of Good Friday

Magic Egg Hunt.desc:
The Magic Egg Hunt will be Saturday, April 19 at 11:00 am at Tuscora Park

Clean-up Day.desc: Barberton City clean-up will be Saturday, April 26

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed 5/.desc: City offices will be closed Monday, May 26 in observance of Memorial Day. Trash pickup will be delayed one day.

Yard sales.desc:
Barberton city-wide yardsale is June 19-22. A yard sale permit is NOT needed for these days only.

More Details
